tweets.text: @Elijah_Meeks Part of the reason I love this field is the diverse backgrounds and interests of people who have, largely, taught it to themselves along with other pursuits. I greatly prefer that to other, very-adjacent fields that have "formal" paths that reek of gatekeeping & credentialism

Planning some vertical integration on my personal brand
Cleaned out my car. Feels good, really. I was hoping to find my wallet but I didn't. Armor-All'd everything. Wish it looked cleaner, still.
.@glassresistor Definitely interested in taking a look at OO/Anaheim json files if you wouldn't mind, cheers ejfox@ejfox.com @bdbreedlove
I need a wallet.
One of my quirks: I don't really have bookmarks. I type in everything by memory. (Makes being on multiple computers way easier, though.)
Just finished dinner, I think that there may have been seitan in the wrap. That's pretty cool. Finished my tic-tac-toe app. Right in time.
Done with lunch- fries, salad, mac and cheese. It was tasty. Debating learning Java so I can write apps for the sidekick.
Just ate breakfast- heard from construction worker on walk over: "No worries, we'll give you a crash course on levers when we're done."
Wake up call just happened, getting dressed and chilling. Kadir (group leader) says he wants us down at 7:30, so we get good food.
Washing up and then sleeping, the paper towel dispenser says 'use turner in case of emergency'. Paper towel emergency.
Just got done with the Id tech orientation thing, gonna unpack and watch a movie soon. God its hot here. Screw humidity.

posts.dek: In which the author reflects on building a Scrapbook system, experiments with a modular synth, and efficiently uploads videos to their blog posts via Cloudinary.
